timeline.message: fixed issue of both sides of an operator being the same
implementations of InputStream.read now return unsigned instead of signed bytes
renamed equal function to avoid confusion with Object.equals
fixed case of only iterating once through a loop
volatile variables that were used with compound operators are nw Atomic variables
fixed issue of conditionally executed code being unreachable

timeline.author: arcturus2

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add a line to the CHANGELOG.md for method signature changes?
timeline.author: arcturus2
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -484,10 +484,10 @@ public String toString() {
      *
      * @param a the first NativeValue object.
      * @param b the second NativeValue object.
-     * @return true if the 2 NativeValue objects are equal for this
-     * NativeValueType.
+     * @return true if the 2 NativeValue objects are equalValue for this
+ NativeValueType.
      */
-    public abstract boolean equal(NativeValue a, NativeValue b);
+    public abstract boolean equalValue(NativeValue a, NativeValue b);

timeline.author: arcturus2
